MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G73 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:54PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:27am on 5th February 2021
